#summary Describes the history of release distributions
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Release history =

The release history of the Java Information Dynamics Toolkit is described here:

 * v0.1.4 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-dist-0.1.4.zip full], [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.4.zip jar]) - 11/09/2013 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=241 svn 241] - added scripts to generate CA figures for 2013 book chapters; added general Java demo code; added Python demo code; made Octave/Matlab demos and CA demos properly compatible for Matlab; added extra Octave/Matlab general demos; added more unit tests for MI and conditional MI calculators, including against results from Wibral's TRENTOOL; bug fixes
 * v0.1.3 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-dist-0.1.3.zip full], [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.3.zip jar]) - 13/01/2013 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=151 svn 151] - updated to make demo Octave/Matlab code properly Matlab compatible; added more unit tests including against results from Kraskov's implementation of MI; made Kraskov calculators use max norm by default instead of via property setting; bug fixes
 * v0.1.2 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-dist-0.1.2.zip full], [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.2.zip jar]) - 19/11/2012 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=116 svn 116] - updated to include demo code for "Moving frames of reference ..." and "Measuring information-transfer delays" paper
 * v0.1.1 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-dist-0.1.1.zip full], [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.1.zip jar]) - 30/10/2012 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=104 svn 104] - first full distribution with ant file, javadocs, jar, junit tests.
 * v0.1 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.zip jar]) - 24/10/2012 - first jar distribution
